authors.name: Laura Lopez
authors.affiliation: National Centre for Immunisation Research and Surveillance

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1tnqi","text":"This is a protocol to determine if Chaoborus preferentially feed on infected or uninfected Daphnia. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
document: {"blocks":[{"key":"fpb36","text":"Predation Selection Trial Protocol","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5s4dp","text":"L. K. Lopez","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"kiu6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9e3ph","text":"Purpose: To determine if Chaoborus preferentially feed on infected or uninfected Daphnia","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":88},{"style":"italic","offset":25,"length":10},{"style":"italic","offset":81,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtnrg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6hsh","text":"1. Rear Mid-37s in 150 mL beakers filled to 120mL with filtered lake water at a density of 20 animals (age 0 days) per beaker. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cujfr","text":"2. At 9 days of age, expose half of the beakers to Metschnikowia spores at a concentration of 200 sp/mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":51,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3irmi","text":"3. Expose the control beakers to the same volume of liquid as the infected beakers, but milliQ water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bia6m","text":"4. 10 days following exposure to spores (19 days of age) check animals for infection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5b0q","text":"5. Conduct selection trials when Daphnia are 19 days of age (10 days following spore/milliQ water exposure).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":33,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"arash","text":"6. On day of trial set-up, photograph a subsample of the infected and control animals for later body size measurements.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9du5j","text":"7. In clean 150 mL beakers filled to 120 mL, place 10 control (uninfected Daphnia) and 10 infected Daphnia in each individual beaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":74,"length":7},{"style":"italic","offset":99,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkeho","text":"8. Add one Chaoborus (preferably 4th instar, but otherwise 3rd).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":11,"length":10},{"style":"sup","offset":34,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":60,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"csbu7","text":"9. Place beakers in incubator at 20C and leave in the dark for 24 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"nm20","text":"10. After 24 hours, remove Chaoborus and after examining daphnia under the microscope, identify how many infected and uninfected animals remain alive. Record this data. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":27,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"boiu2","text":"11. Goal replicate number: minimum 10, preferably 20.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fbpp","text":"12. Use data to calculate Chesson’s alpha","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbf2q","text":"13. Photograph Chaoborus and subsample of Daphnia used in the experiment to account for differences in predator gape size and prey size. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":15,"length":10},{"style":"italic","offset":42,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Predation selection trial protocol
